description:
Are you a Non Resident of India?

Are you staying outside India but earn income from India?

Are you in India but earn Income from outside India?

Are you confused or not clear about tax aspects of Income received in and outside India?

Then this course is for you.

This course is going to take you through the fundamental legal aspects related to Income Tax and Residential status.

Yes. Residential status determines your Income Tax in India and for that it is immaterial whether you are Indian Citizen or not.

Even foreigners are liable for tax in India, if they have income in India.

Similarly, Indians will have tax on income earned outside India.

There are legal nuances in this course will explain you all that.

By taking this course, you will have access to the concepts explaining

a) Residential Status of a Person

b) Residential Status of Individuals

c) Resident but Ordinary Resident

d) Resident but not Ordinary Resident

e) Non Resident

f) Residential Status of Hindu Undivided Family

g) Residential Status of Companies

h) Scope of Total Income

i) Total Income of three categories of Assesses.

j) Income received or deemed to be received in India.

k) Income deemed to accrue or arise in India

This course is structured in Self paced learning style.

Take this course to understand the nuances of Income Tax for Non Residents.
title: Income Tax for Non Residents of India
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
